DOC.brief_summary: The investigator previous study show McGrath Series 5 videolaryngoscope alternative tool double-lumen tube intubation . But determine advantage disadvantage McGrath Series 5 videolaryngoscope double-lumen tube intubation , compare traditional Macintosh laryngoscope .
DOC.brief_title: Comparison McGrath Macintosh Laryngoscope DLT Intubation
DOC.detailed_description: The investigator design randomise control study compare McGrath Series 5 videolaryngoscope Macintosh laryngoscope DLT intubation .
DOC.criteria: Adult patient Thoracic surgery require one lung ventilation Difficult ventilation Emergent operation
